article.title: ReconRobotics to Provide Micro Ground Robots
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ReconRobotics Incorporated, Minneapolis, Minnesota, was awarded a $13,975,038 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 1,100 Recon Scout XT micro unmanned ground robots in support of video reconnaissance. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
